infocenter_data.iar_description: This example demonstrates the Real-Time Timer (RTT) provided on SAMV7/E7 micro-controllers. It enables the user to set an alarm and watch it being triggered when the timer reaches the corresponding value. You can configure the rtt_module "RTT" by following steps - SetPrescaler the RTT to 1s (32768) - Initialize the ISR routine which refresh it when 1s is counted down - Enable the RTT Interrupt of the vector
